This qualification has been designed in response to major changes in the governments policies in working in these sectors spearheaded by the Childrens Workforce Development Council Implementation of these policies will require a more integrated approach to delivering services to children and young people.

As a consequence closer collaboration between social care profes­sionals, educationalists and health officials will be required. The programme offers an exciting new pathway for those developing careers in working with children and young people in education and/or care settings and for those interested in pursuing a career in these and allied sectors.

The foundation degree will enable those who support children and young peoples development including teaching assistants, childrens service employees, playworkers and others, to have access to a higher level qualification that is directly relevant to their day to day employment.

Participants will have aspirations to work with or experience in working with children and young people from ages 0  16 years and/or vulnerable young adults, in a variety of settings including schools, childrens centres, extended schools, pre-school and care provision in both public, looked after children, private, voluntary and independent organisations. Delivery will draw upon the expertise of specialist practitioners in order to provide professionally relevant contexts.

The degree is therefore suitable for a broad range of aspiring and qualified professionals including:
  • Teaching assistants
  • Health and social care practitioners
  • Childrens centres employees including extended schools
  • Learning support workers in a variety of settings
  • Youth services employees
  • Students with A Levels and/or relevant experience who are seeking careers in education and/or childrens welfare, childcare

On successful completion of this course students can use it to gain enhanced employment opportunities, further develop their academic profile by progressing onto a relevant BA Honours Degree such as. Childhood and Youth.
